Hi! I'm Chigozie Emuchay

A Product Designer & Front-end Developer based in Lagos, Nigeria.

I create user-friendly, accessible, and visually appealing digital experiences that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

Introduction

About me

I am a passionate and dedicated web developer with a knack for creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I specialize in building responsive and dynamic web applications that cater to the needs of modern users. My goal is to deliver high-quality solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations.

  • Languages

    HTML, CSS, JavaScript React Js, Next Js

  • Education

    B.Tech in Computer Science

  • Projects

    Built more than 5 projects
